abstract: The agreement is with You On Demand, a growing service in China that is operated by the son of Vince McMahon, the World Wrestling Entertainment chief.
snippet: The agreement is with You On Demand, a growing service in China that is operated by the son of Vince McMahon, the World Wrestling Entertainment chief.
lead_paragraph: Mickey Mouse and Steven Spielberg on Wednesday became the latest Hollywood heavyweights to sign a deal with You On Demand, an upstart company that has quickly become China’s leading national video-on-demand provider.

headline.main: Deal Puts Mickey Mouse and Spielberg on Chinese Screens
